original: Lindskog, Axel, borgmästare. Var-berg, f. 31/8/07 i Lund av prof. Claes L. o. Hilma Scholander. G. 39 m. Kerstin Magnusson. Barn: Claes f. 40, Barbro 42, Annika 45. — Stud:ex. i Lund 26, jur. kand. där 31. Tings-tjg. i Torna o. Bara doms. 31-34, e. fiskal i Göta hovr. 34, assessor där 40, tf. byråchef h. MO 42-43, borgmäst. i Varberg sed. 44, utredn :uppdrag i just :dep. betr. tvångsuppfostran, villkor!. dom o. frigivn., kastrering m. m. tidvis 35-41, sekr. i Södra Möre doms. 36, i Askims doms. 37-39 samt i Vättle, Ale o. KuHings dom^s. 41-42. V. ordf. i Lunds stud:kår 31, ordf. i Jurid. fören. i Lund 32-34, ordf. i fören. Yngre jurister under Göta hovr. 40-41, dito i Varbergs human. förb. sed. 44, i Var-ibergs ibyggn :nd sed. 45 samt i badhusstyr. o. Varbergs Stads Sparbank sed. 46, v. ordf. i direkt, f. kustsanat. Apel-viken sed. 46. Insp. f. komm. flicksk. sed. 45. Skr.: div. art. i Sv. Jurist-tidn. o. Sydsv. Dagbl.
translated: Lindskog, Axel, mayor. Varberg, born 31/8/07 in Lund to Professor Claes L. and Hilma Scholander. Married in 1939 to Kerstin Magnusson. Children: Claes born 1940, Barbro 1942, Annika 1945. Completed high school in Lund in 1926, law degree there in 1931. Served as court officer in Torna and Bara district courts from 1931-1934, deputy prosecutor in Göta Court of Appeals in 1934, associate judge there in 1940, acting head of department in the Ministry of Justice from 1942-1943, mayor of Varberg since 1944. Assigned to investigations in the Ministry of Justice regarding compulsory upbringing, conditional sentences, castration, and more from 1935-1941. Secretary in Southern Möre district court in 1936, in Askim district court from 1937-1939, and in Vättle, Ale, and Kuhings district courts from 1941-1942. Vice-chairman of Lund's student union in 1931, chairman of the Juridical Association in Lund from 1932-1934, chairman of the Association of Young Lawyers under the Göta Court of Appeals from 1940-1941, and the same in Varberg's Humane Association since 1944, in Varberg's Building Board since 1945, as well as in the swimming pool committee and Varbergs City Savings Bank since 1946, vice-chairman of the board of Apelviken Coastal Sanatorium since 1946. Inspector for the municipal girls' school since 1945. Writings: various articles in the Swedish Legal Journal and Sydsvenska Dagbladet.
